<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/scalartax/s_l_nexuses/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint allows the user to update the transaction information for a specific tenant.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"path","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":null}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"example":{"message":"Records updated and created successfully"}}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad Request. Malformed request or invalid data."},"404":{"description":"Not Found. Transaction with that Specific ID not Found.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","example":{"error":"Transaction Not Found."}}}}},"422":{"description":"Unprocessable Entity. Validation errors occurred during the update.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","example":{"errors":["Validation error message"]}}}}},"500":{"description":"Internal Serval Error"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
